children.subject: Hi there, yes that's something we can do over email. Please email your form for us to sign it at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu. Please include any information we might need. Thank you!
If we need one of our forms signed by a CS major advisor, how can we get it signed? Should we schedule an appointment or just need to send the forms over? Thanks!
Usually the adviser will include the link in the bcal event or will email the student with the link. Please email the adviser directly. Thanks!
I have an appointment today but my invitation link didn't include any zoom / hangout links. Who should I contact for this?

history.content:
Dear EECS Majors,


We hope this email finds you all in great spirits amidst the academic changes due to COVID-19. We want to remind you that we are here to support you!

We are reaching out to let you know that effective Thursday, March 12, all EECS Advising appointments will be available only via phone, Google Hangouts, and Zoom. We hope to resume in-person appointments once we have more information from campus and will keep you posted. We are also available by email: eecs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu.

You can schedule an appointment with us through this link. Note that you need to choose an appointment type, either phone, Google Hangouts, or Zoom. You can always email us the documents, forms, etc. needed for your appointment in advance.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you!

Best,
EECS Advising Team: Andrea, Heather, and Mayra
